attributes.action: Petition to help keep Gokhan Durmus on Life Support
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to prevent switching off the life support machine of Gokhan Durmus until his family are convinced that there is nothing further that can be done to save his life. We believe that it is too early to switch his machine off and believe that more time needs to be given so that he can have a chance to recover. Please sign this petition to show your support and possibly save a life.
